about_the_game:
Catch the Yeti! is a game where you try to catch the hiding yeti. Despite its casual look, it is a serious turn-based puzzle game requiring deep thought.

Catch the Yeti! contains completely new puzzle mechanism!

The Yeti can only hide behind snowy trees. If you click a tree to remove snow, the Yeti can no longer hide behind the tree. However, after three turns, the tree reverts back to snowy tree.

The Yeti is fast and strong, so you can't catch it by merely following it like whack-a-mole game. Trap yeti into a corner using the three trees Yeti cannot cross. Snowy trees are considered connected if they are side by side horizontally or vertically.

After clearing Chapter 1, the rock appears as the new gimmick. Unlike trees which stay un-hide-able for three turns, rocks revert back in only one turn. Can you catch the yeti even in complex maps containing both rocks and trees?

Chapter 3 includes snow piles which need to be dug up with a shovel, and Chapter 4 contains tree burrows, which are connected underground. The last Chapter 11 contains complex maps including all gimmicks appeared before.

Would you like a 'brain' battle with the cute Yeti? Over 200 puzzle maps are available!

Key Features
- Cute 3D graphics
- Brand new puzzle
- Hard, but fun puzzles requiring deep thought
- 10 new gimmicks
- 200+ puzzles


Developer Contact: pinebuddev@gmail.com
